Player History

Traded from Los Angeles to Cincinnati on 5/18/1985 (Going to LAD: RF Dave Parker, CF Max Venable. Going to CIN: P Bob Kipper, SS Mariano Duncan, 1B Franklin Stubbs, CF Mike Devereaux, CF Fred Lynn).
..
Injured on 4/18/1986 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
